content:
~
❯ elan toolchain list
stable
leanprover/lean4:nightly
leanprover/lean4:v4.10.0
leanprover/lean4:v4.10.0-rc1
leanprover/lean4:v4.10.0-rc2
leanprover/lean4:v4.11.0-rc1
leanprover/lean4:v4.8.0
leanprover/lean4:v4.8.0-rc1
leanprover/lean4:v4.8.0-rc2
leanprover/lean4:v4.9.0
leanprover/lean4:v4.9.0-rc2
leanprover/lean4:v4.9.0-rc3

~
❯ lake --version
error: toolchain 'leanprover/lean4:stable' is not installed
info: caused by: not a directory: '~\.elan\toolchains\leanprover--lean4---stable'
why this error occurs? how to fix this?
What is the output of elan show? It seems like elan is defaulting to leanrpover/lean4:stable for some reason.
Thank you!! The issue is now resolved.
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
